title: RAG: Still Relevant in the Era of Long Context Models
author: Shahebaz Mohammad
description: While RAG will remain a staple of production applications, Gemini 1.5 Pro and similar models will help enterprise data science teams.
cntitle: RAG：在长上下文模型时代仍然相关
cndescription: 虽然 RAG 仍将是生产应用程序的主要内容，但 Gemini 1.5 Pro 和类似模型将帮助企业数据科学团队。
